name: Villae: Piazza Armerina - Early Prototype
description:
Villae: Piazza Armerina is a Web GL project designed to help teach players about archeology and the reconstruction of the Villa Romana del Casale through the lens of the journal left behind by the famous Italian archeologist, Ersilia Caetani-Lovatelli. It was done through the University of Arkansas at my current employer, The Tesseract Center for Immersive Environment and Game Design: http://tesseract.uark.edu/

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Move Camera
  • F - Toggle Journal Focus
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - Flip Journal Pages
